articles.description: In a recent interview Myra Williams, 78, recalled how she managed the family finances, and bought homes and cars despite being a young teenager during her marriage to Jerry Lee Lewis.
articles.content:
Jerry Lee Lewis ex-wife revealed that her father chased her new husband down with a gun when he learned when the rocker had eloped with his daughter when she was just 13 years old.
